## TaskQueue.(constructor)

Creates a new TaskQueue.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(limit?: number, options?: QueueOptions);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  limit | number | The maximum number of concurrent tasks to launch |
|  options | [QueueOptions](./promizr.queueoptions.md) | The options for the TaskQueue |
